Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to sharp turn of a pottery transport amphora. Clay medium red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Theophilos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0365.06.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (354)
